articles.content: instagram.comSpeaking after that incident, Kim said that North loved makeup, and she viewed it as a form of self-expression. Speaking to Refinery 29, Kim said: "I already know North is into makeup for sure. I don't think she should wear lashes or too dark of … [+112 chars]
